name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: now.gg: Play top mobile games free online

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play 200+ top original mobile games like Stumble Guys, Among Us instantly on Chromebook or PC. No download or installation needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
now.gg extension gives you the power to turn your browser into your new gaming destination.

➤ No downloading, no waiting. 
This handy extension lets you try hundreds of original top mobile games unblocked online for free, without downloading.
This includes AAA original mobile games like Stumble Guys, Gacha Club, Gacha Life, Melon Playground, Among Us and many more.

➤ It's easy to start playing games in your browser. 
1. Pick a game
2. Click on 'Play Now' 
3. Game will launch in a new tab

➤ One extension. All your favourite games.
There are multiple titles from all genres available here like action, adventure, RPG and strategy. You can even choose to play awesome games online for free with now.gg.

➤ One click and it's game on! 
Unlock instant gaming with the now.gg extension whether you are on Play Store, Reddit or Twitch. Find the game, click and get gaming. No need to wait for updates and installs. Awesome gaming experience every time.

➤ Curated lists
Can't decide what to play? We got you. You can choose from curated charts like trending games and top games. Find a new treasure every day while you play games in the browser.

To tell us about your gaming experience and for sharing suggestions, connect
with us on cloudgames@now.gg.

Use of this extension is subject to now.gg Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Terms of Service (https://now.gg/terms-and-privacy.html#terms)
Privacy Policy (https://now.gg/terms-and-privacy.html#privacy)
